Desc.entry: Friendly informal group for parents of babies and toddlers with any disability or impairment. Offers parents the chance to meet other parents who have had similar experiences. Brothers and sisters of pre-school age are welcome.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Wheelchair accessible except balcony and upstairs offices.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: One Thurs in the month 10am-12noon (term-time only)
